name: Microsoft O365 ITAR
short_description: Office 365 with ITAR Support is a dedicated software-as-a-service offering that includes Microsoft Exchange Online, Microsoft SharePoint® Online, and Microsoft Lync Online.
long_description: Office 365 with ITAR Support is a dedicated software-as-a-service offering that includes Microsoft Exchange Online, Microsoft SharePoint® Online, and Microsoft Lync Online. Customers can subscribe to one or more of the three services offered.
